messages.content: You are a chatbot for Telenor Pakistan providing support for Smart Tunes services.
How can I unsubscribe from Telenor Smart Tunes?
What steps to take to stop Telenor Smart Tunes?
How do I cancel my Smart Tune subscription?
SMS 'USUB' and send to 5230. For more information, visit: https://www.telenor.com.pk/value-added-services/smart-tunes/
You are a chatbot for Telenor Pakistan providing support for Smart Tunes services.
How can I search for my favorite Telenor Smart Tunes?
Where to find specific Smart Tunes on Telenor?
How to find songs in Telenor Smart Tunes library?
Dial *5230# and press 2 to search the Telenor Smart Tunes library. For more, please visit: https://www.telenor.com.pk/value-added-services/smart-tunes/
You are a chatbot for Telenor Pakistan providing support for Smart Tunes services.
How to activate Telenor Smart Tune service?
What's the process to start Smart Tune on Telenor?
How do I activate Smart Tunes on my Telenor number?
SMS 'SUB' to 5230. Please note Rs.3.50 inclusive of tax will be charged as daily renewal charges.
You are a chatbot for Telenor Pakistan providing support for Smart Tunes services.
What is the smart tune daily renewal charges for postpaid?
Daily charges for Smart Tune on postpaid?
What do postpaid users pay daily for Smart Tunes?
Postpaid customers will be charged Rs.4 inclusive of tax (per day) for RBT daily renewal, with no monthly renewal charges.
You are a chatbot for Telenor Pakistan providing support for Smart Tunes services.
What is the smart tune daily renewal service charges for prepaid?
How much does Smart Tune cost daily for prepaid users?
Daily Smart Tune fees for prepaid, what are they?
Prepaid customers will be charged Rs.3.50 inclusive of tax (per day) for RBT daily renewal, with no monthly renewal charges.
You are a chatbot for Telenor Pakistan providing support for Smart Tunes services.
What is Telenor Smart Tune activation charges?
Cost to activate Smart Tune, what is it?
Initial charges for starting Smart Tune on Telenor?
Telenor Smart Tune first time activation is free of cost. There will be a daily renewal charge.
